tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Vehicle (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    make VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    model VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    year INT NOT NULL,
    emissions_rating VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE vehicle (vehicle_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  make VARCHAR(255),
  model VARCHAR(255),
  year INT,
  fuel_type VARCHAR(50))

CREATE TABLE emissions_test (test_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id UUID REFERENCES vehicle(vehicle_id),
  test_date DATE,
  test_result VARCHAR(50),
  tester_name VARCHAR(100))

CREATE TABLE compliance_data (compliance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id UUID REFERENCES vehicle(vehicle_id),
  compliance_status VARCHAR(50),
  compliance_date DATE)

CREATE TABLE Vehicle (
  vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
  model VARCHAR(255),
  year INT,
  emission_rating VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE EmissionTest (
  test_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT,
  test_date DATE,
  test_result VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES Vehicle(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Compliance (
  compliance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT,
  compliance_date DATE,
  compliance_status VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES Vehicle(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Vehicle_Details (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_make VARCHAR(50),
  vehicle_model VARCHAR(50),
  year_of_manufacture INT,
  registration_date DATE,
  emission_test_result VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Emission_Standards (
  standard_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  standard_name VARCHAR(50),
  co_limit DECIMAL(5,2),
  nox_limit DECIMAL(5,2),
  hc_limit DECIMAL(5,2),
  pm_limit DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE Emission_Test_Records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT,
  test_date DATE,
  test_result VARCHAR(20),
  co_level DECIMAL(5,2),
  nox_level DECIMAL(5,2),
  hc_level DECIMAL(5,2),
  pm_level DECIMAL(5,2),
  FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES Vehicle_Details(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Compliance_Status (
  status_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  record_id INT,
  compliance_date DATE,
  compliance_status VARCHAR(10),
  FOREIGN KEY (record_id) REFERENCES Emission_Test_Records(record_id)
);
